title: Logan Square Studio 1Bedroom Dishwasher Pets OK W/D On-Site
posting_body: This renovated studio, one bathroom apartment in Logan Square features a kitchen with granite counter tops, tiled backsplash, and stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher, hardwood flooring throughout, and includes cooking gas in the price of rent.
The building is pet friendly, and has an on-site laundry facility.
Send me an email today for a private tour!About me: My name is Jessica Kearney and I am an agent with Sq1 Real Estate.
I'm a Chicago native and I would love to help you find the right place for you.
Located on a lush boulevard, this beautiful and unique building is part of the 2 ½ mile-long Logan Square Historic District.
While this stunning area has remained virtually unchanged for over a century, our newly renovated units are packed with modern and desirable amenities!
Logan Park, only a quick 0.3 miles north, is a perfect place to walk your dog.
The Whirlaway Lounge is just around the corner, which is a long-standing neighborhood watering hole.
